oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Discharge paper for William W. Allen, Assistant Surgeon
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Discharge paper for William W. Allen, assistant surgeon of the US Army, who was discharged on December 19, 1863. He was discharged in consequence of his being appointed Ast. Surgeon of 5th Regiment, Wisconsin Volunteer Infantry. At the time of this discharge, William W. Allen was 28 years old.
